coreAttributes.name: Jet Black Coffee
coreAttributes.description: A plastic bottle of cold-brew coffee, advertised as having an extremely high caffeine content. At the bottom of the bottle's label there's a picture of a spider-girl who's passed out drunk, and beneath her, the cautionary words: 'Warning! Extremely alcoholic to spiders!'
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] #IF(npc.getRace()==RACE_charisma_spider) [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.25)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first unscrewing the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of coffee up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A strong smell of espresso assaults [npc.her] nostrils, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the cool liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] a surge of alertness. #IF(npc.getRace()==RACE_charisma_spider) Due to [npc.her] spider physiology, the caffeine in the beverage acts in a similar manner to alcohol, and as a result [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.herself] getting [style.boldAlcohol(drunk)]. #ENDIF
